use.flag: Build JSON output plugin to save packets in JSON file format.
Build PCAP output plugin to save packets in libpcap file format.
Build MySQL output plugin to save packets in a mysql database.
Build PGSQL output plugin to save packets in a postgres database.
Build SQLITE3 output plugin to save packets in a sqlite database.
Build NFLOG input plugin to support stateless packet-based logging via nfnetlink_queue.
Build NFCT input plugin to support stateful flow-based logging via nf_conntrack_netlink.
Build NFACCT input plugin to support traffic accounting via nfnetlink_acct.
Build ULOG input plugin to support deprecated packet-based logging via ULOG target.
